segments.text: I see the boy's hand deep inside that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's definitely pilfering those treats without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is acting as a lookout, or at least an accomplice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are clearly sneaking around behind the woman's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of deceitful behavior isn't really admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It shows a lack of respect for the household rules.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Children should ask before taking food, especially from a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They think they're being clever, but it's just plain wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way they're so stealthy about it almost makes me sick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such sneaky actions can lead to bad habits in the future.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find their clandestine operation rather distasteful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a small act, but it speaks volumes about their disregard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should definitely intervene and stop them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of behavior is not something to be encouraged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They will certainly get a stomach ache if they eat all those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
